name: Instability
description:
A cross-platform competitive multiplayer real time strategy game. Build your base to destroy your enemy!

Instability features player vs. player combat and fast paced action, packed with hand drawn art and stressful battles. Experience competitive multiplayer mayhem that will keep you coming back in this reaction based, mobile real-time strategy game.

Instability features cross platform support so that you can test your skills against your friends on both PC and Android devices.
